scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Lamentation of Christ. The body of Christ, with visible wounds, is cradled by the Virgin Mary, who is dressed in a blue mantle and has her hands clasped in prayer. To the left, a woman in a red cloak holds Christ's head, while another woman in a red cloak stands to the right, also in prayer. Above, a cross with the inscription "INRI" is visible, and two winged figures, possibly angels, are depicted on either side of the cross. In the background, a city with numerous spires and buildings is rendered, suggesting a landscape setting. The scene is framed by architectural elements on the left and right, resembling columns with decorative capitals.
